name: Puffed Rice Salad With Chicken
recipeIngredient: 1 pound boneless chicken thighs, cut into small chunks
1 cup cooked or canned chickpeas, drained
1 cucumber, peeled and seeded if necessary, and chopped
1 large ripe tomato, cored and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Put the oil in a medium skillet over medium-high heat. When it’s hot, add the chicken; sprinkle with salt and pepper. Cook, stirring occasionally, until browned and cooked through, 5 to 10 minutes. Add the shredded coconut and curry powder. Cook, stirring to coat chicken, until curry is fragrant and coconut lightly toasted, a minute or two. Transfer to a large serving bowl; let cool for a few minutes.
Add the remaining ingredients to the bowl, and toss well to combine. Taste and adjust the seasoning and let the salad sit for a few minutes (no more than 10) before serving.
